mapper.sql: LOG_STEP_ID AS logStepId , LOG_TRANS_ID AS logTransId , CHANNEL_ID AS channelId , LOG_DATE AS logDate , TRANSNAME AS transname , STEPNAME AS stepname , STEP_COPY AS stepCopy , LINES_READ AS linesRead , LINES_WRITTEN AS linesWritten , LINES_UPDATED AS linesUpdated , LINES_INPUT AS linesInput , LINES_OUTPUT AS linesOutput , LINES_REJECTED AS linesRejected , ERRORS AS errors , SETP_LOG AS setpLog , COSTTIME AS costtime , SPEED AS speed , STATUS AS status
